title: Come home to Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes! 2 Bed / 1.5 Bath available!
neighborhood: 25 Minute Drive to Newman Wetlands Center
posting_body: ['Community Location:', '501 Roberts Dr - Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Rental Information:', '$1206 - $1391/Month | 2 Bedroom 1.5 Bath | 1028 sq ft', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities:', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '✓ Range', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '✓ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '✓ Eat-in Kitchen', '✓ Private Patio or Balcony', '✓ Vinyl Flooring', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Property Features:', '✓ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '✓ Controlled Access', '✓ Grill', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Online Services', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Playground', '✓ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '✓ Sun Deck', '✓ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '✓ Clothes Care Center/Laundry Facilities', '✓ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '✓ Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '✓ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '✓ Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '✓ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '✓ Monthly Pest Control', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Resident Referral Program', 'Description:', 'We offer 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes that offer large floor plans, and each unit has a private patio or balconies.', 'In addition, Emerald Pointe is only minutes away from downtown Atlanta, so you will always have easy access to various restaurants and shops!', 'Pets:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions 25lbs.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Call:', 'Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '619E1DC5B7734938']
